reviewText: Love this movie
A lot of scratches...took it to a video/games store and got it buffed. Plays
Very touching
Great little movie
Immediately upon receipt, I began showing this film to several visitors and ALL LOVE IT!  A MEMORABLE AND HEART WARMING FILM.

I wept as I recognized poor white folks as they lived in the not so long ago. It could have been a documentary about one cousin of mine.  Della Reese and Ossie Davis gjve performances which are not to be missed. Most "white trash" stories are cariacatures from afar. This one isn't.
purchased this for a friend and she loves it
What a heart warming movie!!
One of the best ever! Della and Ossie are formidable! Great redemptive story.

After looking all over the internet for this movie, I knew I had to buy it once I found out the name.

I love Della Reese, the whole cast of this movie is brilliant. This is a classic, that every movie lover should watch.
Watched this movie several years ago on tv and have been looking for it ever since. Great cast and great story!!!!
heart warming story!
Priced right, given as a gift.
Saw this on hallmark, a while back, excellent acting, and della reese is incredible in the film.
Amazingly warm movie that reaches the heart and leaves you wanting to see more. I have watched it over 10 times since I made the purchase.
I highly recommend this movie box set! These movie will make you cry and warm your heart. I absolutely loved watching these movies.

Good movie I saw on the Hallmark channel several years ago. Story is about a young girl who has to choose between taking care of herself or doing what her family wants. The girl makes friends with an old African American couple that live nearby who usher her into womanhood. This relationship causes stress in the environment of the movies setting.
Very happy with the purchase. Thank you

After searching what seemed forever I found this old time favorites of my sister in law and her mother and got it as the perfect Christmas stocking stuffer! Great quality and wonderful memories with this movie!
I love Ozzie Davis and it was a very thought provoking movie.

My Sociology class watched this movie this semester, and I loved it. We didn't get to see the whole movie, so I bought it to add to my collection. This movie covered a lot of the topics we had in class. I would recommend this for anyone. The slurs used in the movie were common in the time period this was covered, and was a teaching lesson that words used the wrong way, can hurt others. I'm currently waiting for the movie to arrive.
DVD set arrived very quickly.  I have been enjoying this movie so much,  I think there are parts to this movie a lot of us might be able to relate to.  Thanx so much for this.
A very good movie.
touching
I love this movie. It's a sweet, heartwarming tell about family.
Happy I found this again! this was my favorite movie as a kid. FYI IT USED TO BE CALLED SECRET PATH,
There were no scratches. It is a good and quality DVD. This is one of my favorite movies. Thank you
It was for my daughter, she saw it on norwegian tv years ago, and is not possible to buy her. She just loves if :)
This was not a movie that I liked because of the racial slurs in it.  The people in the movie were good actors I just didn't like the content.

When I was a little kid I saw this movie.
I wanted people like those people that saved her around me .
I think everyone needs caring souls like those people

I got the dvd looks good I started watching the movie and played good but somewhere in the middle the dvd stopped and skiped ahead I have another dvd player so I tryed it in that one but same thing happened. I tryed to clean dvd and play but same thing it skiped. I went into scene seletion and tryed to fast foward and rewind through the scene where it skiped. I was able to rewind it then try to watch it but it still would stop and skip the scene. so I gave up and just watched rest of the movie but I miss about 20 mins in the middle of the movie. Not what I like to see only part of it.

This was a very touching movie. I've seen it twice when it was on Liftime a few years ago. My daughters were much younger then. I didn't think they were mature enough to appreciate the movie at that time. But when I found the movie on Amazon I knew I had to purchase it. I watched the movie again with dauthers. They too were touched. It is a movie that I will still watch years to come.

Della Reese once again gave an outstanding performance.

I could not find this movie anywhere in a store. It is a very good
learning tool and very enjoyable to watch. Came as promised on
time in great shape. I will enjoy this over and over again.
Will buy again from this vendor.
movie arrived in condition stated. i personally love this movie and waiting for it was no problem even if it arrived before schedule. i will order from these guys again.

This movie, in my opinion, was an excellent film.  It was the kind of movie that you wouldn't mind seeing several times.  Della Reese was super as usual.  I highly recommend this movie, but be prepared to cry a little.

Oh my, what a movie. I am a big fan of Miss Della Reese. I love her to death. This is one movie everyone should see. Love the movie, and sensitive subject. A family movie. Its about a young white girl, growning up in poverty. Ms. Della Reese steps in with her husband "To Tall" played by Civil Rights Activist, Ossie Davis. Great Acting, Great Movie. A must see also!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This is a very good movie! A definite must see movie! I highly recommend it! It is about a woman who overhears her uppity, teenage daughter, making fun of this poor girl in school, and the woman decides to teach her daughter a lesson that she will never forget!

 The daughter begins to  learn things about her mother, and her mother's past that she never knew! The mother takes her to a place that holds unhappy memories, for her mother, and also tells her daughter about a wonderful loving, black couple that saved her life! This is a heartrending, and heartwarming, awesome story!

 This is a story about a very remarkable, strong, special woman who had all the odds against her during her awful childhood, growing up years, and also about a wonderful black elderly couple, who also had all the odds against them, and they befriended and loved this poor young white girl any way, because the girl had no one that cared!

Chasing Secrets is an inspirational story of a down-trodden and abused white girl befriended and given a wonderful chance in life by a poor black couple with excellent Christian values.  The film's strongest message is that any person, regardless of education or economic status, can make a difference in another person's life with love and a willingness to teach and guide.  I would highly recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys seeing love, courage, and decency triumphing over wickedness.
When you can get a teen-aged boy to watch this with his mom, you know you  have a wonderful movie!  It's one I dearly love.
I ORDERED THIS DVD FOR MY MOM, WHO HAD SEEN THE MOVIE ON TV. THE MOVIE IS HIGH ON HER "FAVORITES LIST"!!

I don't know why I waited so long to see this movie. It is a 5 star. My husband and I both cried and laughed. Acting was superb and it was very well done.
Buy it-you will NOT be sorry!

This movie was truly heartwarming and endearing. I watched 3x's, i grew up in the south, so I'm familiar with the issues in this movie. Love is a conquering force, overcome evil with good, such a powerful and positive message of what love can do.

Who would think that a successful writer would get her start from two elderly black surrogate parents?  Chasing Secrets is the type of movie that tears at your heartstrings.  Della Reese is excellent as "Honey" a woman who has lost her own child and she takes in this abused white girl who is forced, by her abusive grandfather to do things no 14 year old should have to face.  Ossie Davis is his usual loveable character and plays well opposite Della Reese.  Crystal Bernard's character is also played well, as the misguided young mother.  Get your tissue box out as this movie packs a powerful punch.  It's a great movie about possibilities.

One of my favorite movies, and the story may be applicable to many of today's families. A well-to-do mother of two privileged teenage daughters finds them too prideful for her liking, so decides to show them their roots. She takes them to the place where she grew up, and tells them about the squalor and abuse of her own childhood--something they had previously known nothing about. The story unfolds about an elderly black couple who loved her, taught her, and gave her a chance at a real life. Warm, touching, and absorbing--and they do it without putting anything in that the whole family can't watch.

especially in this day and time!  I so loved it, will buy many copies and give away to fam and friends, I watched it in the middle of the day on Lifetime so I know many haven't seen it.. All actors involved are just fabulous, both girls, both elders, even the horrible people are great;-)  Watch it, own it, give it as a gift..beautifully directed, and on & on~

This movie is one of the best I've seen in a long time.  Della Reese

is outstanding in her performance and is backed by another great performance by Ozzie Davis.  A great family movie, that teaches children not to judge other kids by their social status.  I would give this movie 6 stars if they would let me.
This is one loving movie and a good example for loving anyone's child that is being abused.  This loving AfAmercian couple showed what sensible love is.
Purchased as a gift.

I love this movie. I have watched many movies over the last 15 years. But very few of them hit home like this movie did . The acting is great , the plot is wonderful. And when you finish the movie theres a good feeling that you have at the end. I would definitely recommend this movie to someone looking for characters that comprise of strength, that grasp opportunity, And just a general feeling of warmth at the end. It is a true reflection of how much one person, the right person can change a childs life. I loved Della Reeses acting!
enjoyed the movie very much
Great acting and a look what to see where we have come from and know that sometimes progress comes slowly.

This is an excellent movie about child abuse, plain and simple. The story itself rings true as the abused girl found refuge in a loving Black couple, who lived in a ramshackle house nearby. They rescued, nurtured, and protected her, to the extent possible for this time period. Della Reese and Ossie Davis are superb in their portrayal of this compassionate couple. The love and care extended to this little girl by them was heartwarming and a lesson to all parents on how to take care of our children. The dresses for the little girl were not believable as they looked more like they came out of vogue magazine than the impoverished, rural country she lived in. The fairly new saddle oxford shoes and matching socks didn't make much sense either. Growing up poor means your shoes are too small and worn out, and when you're neglected, you hardly ever have socks that match. The actors, including the little girl, carried the movie. I'd give all three an A+, the cinematography an A, but the overall production a C-.  Want to make a special mention of the actress who played the little girl's mother. I've not seen her before or since in any movie. It was a flawless interpretation and performance of a troubled mother, raised in the same wretched conditions as her daughter. (Brava!)

Very good story-line.  The movie is little shorter version than the book that I recall that it was based on but none the less it was well worth the money and has an excellent plot.  Arrived quickly and reasonably priced.
Excellent Movie!!!  So much going on for both families and the struggles of life.  So many teaching moments that are even applicable today.
A very special story. One that's lost through the years.

This movie was really incredible and profound! I am so grateful that my family and I have it for the long haul, as opposed to a rental. Unfortunately, it had a few scratches on the back of the disc, however, it still ran well.
